title: The Top 25 Black Friday Beauty Deals from Ulta Beauty to Amazon that are Actually Worth Shopping
summary: Take advantage of sales up to 55% off on major brands including Fenty Beauty, Dyson and Rare Beauty.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The biggest holiday savings event is here as Black Friday 2025 discounts and deals have officially kicked off — and that includes beauty brands. Rather than just giving you one day of sales, most beauty brands are hosting steals on makeup and skincare until Monday (Dec. 2), giving beauty lovers plenty of time to stock up on their essentials. Whether you’re on the hunt for musician-backed products or the ultimate gift for the beauty lover in you life, the best Black Friday beauty deals are offering up to 55% off — but they won’t last forever. Consider this a sign to give your beauty routine an upgrade and without breaking the bank. It’s not too early to start holiday shopping, either — especially for the beauty lover in your life. Black Friday deals are the perfect opportunity to snag gifts for everyone without worrying about overspending. Major beauty brands such as Ulta, Sephora and even Amazon are discounting po…

title: Best Black Friday Sony PlayStation 5 Deals: Here’s How to Save Big All Things PS5 Online
summary: Save up to a whopping 60% on all things PS5 for the massive shopping event.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The best time to shop the best Black Friday deals is right now — especially if you’re shopping for the gamer in your life. We rounded up the best Black Friday deals on all things Sony PlayStation 5 from retailers like Walmart . You can save up to a whopping 60% on PS5 consoles, accessories, games and more. In fact, even the very cool PS Portal portable handheld device is on sale too. Shop: Best Black Friday PS5 Deals at Walmart Since most of these deals are from Walmart, you’ll get it shipped to you for free if you’re a Walmart+ member. Otherwise, your cart has to be more than $35 to get free shipping. And right now, you can get Walmart+ for half off for the entire year . That’s just $49 for an annual subscription (reg. $98 per year). Learn more about Walmart+ here . If you’re not a member, then you’re in luck. You can sign up for a 30-day free trial to take advantage of everything the retailer’s …

title: Taylor Swift’s ‘The Fate of Ophelia’ Holds Court Atop U.K. Charts for Sixth Week
summary: It marks Swift’s longest-running U.K. No. 1 since “Anti-Hero” from 2022’s Midnights.
body: Taylor Swift continues her reign over the U.K.’s Official Singles Chart , landing her sixth non-consecutive week at No. 1 with “The Fate of Ophelia” (Nov. 28). The track appears on the superstar’s 12th studio album The Life of a Showgirl , and first hit the summit on the U.K. charts dated Oct. 10, holding the spot for three consecutive weeks. After being briefly knocked off the top spot by KPop Demon Hunters ’ “Golden,” Swift regained the No. 1 earlier this month (Nov. 28), where she has remained since. The current leading ladies in British pop have also made major moves on the chart this week. It’s a personal best for RAYE’s “Where Is My Husband!,” which secures a new No. 2 peak, while Olivia Dean’s “So Easy (To Fall In Love)” follows, breaking the top three for the first time.  Dean also scoops a hat-trick, rounding out the top five with “Man I Need” (No. 4) and Sam Fender collab “Rein Me In” (No. 5). “Let Alone the One You Love,” another track from the north London singer’s The Art Of Loving LP, makes its maiden chart entry at No. 21. Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande earn this week’s highest new entry with For Good (No. 14), the emotional centrepiece of th…

title: Ray J Arrested After Allegedly Pointing Gun at Princess Love During Thanksgiving Livestream
summary: The singer was released on a $50,000 bond on Thanksgiving night.
body: Ray J was arrested after allegedly pointing a gun at his ex-wife, Princess Love, during a livestreamed argument on Thanksgiving. The 44-year-old singer, whose real name is William Ray Norwood Jr., was taken into custody by Los Angeles police on Thursday (Nov. 27) and charged with making a criminal threat. Officers had responded to a report of assault with a deadly weapon and domestic violence, according to NBC News . Related Kim Kardashian and Kris Jenner Leaked Infamous 2007 Sex Tape, Ray J Claims in New Lawsuit Ray J Says Brandy ‘Hates’ Him After Viral Kai Cenat Sleepover Drama Ray J Regrets His Infamous ‘Breakfast Club’ Rant Aimed at Fabolous: ‘I Was Very Vulnerable’ Ray J, the younger brother of singer Brandy, was booked at the LAPD’s Van Nuys Station and released on $50,000 bond later that night, jail records reportedly indicate. Video footage of the heated incident, published by TMZ , appears to show Ray J livestreaming a confrontation with Princess Love, 41, over the custody of their children. The former couple share daughter Melody Love, 7, and son Epik Ray, 5. In the edited clip, Ray J appears to pull a gun while Love — holdin…

title: Bose’s Most Popular Noise-Cancelling Headphones Are $130 Off for Black Friday
summary: Great for work or play, these Bose QuietComfort Noise-Cancelling headphones are down to the lowest price of the year.
body: Black Friday is officially here, and this Bose headphones deal is one worth jumping on. Right now, you can get the top-rated Bose QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones for just $299 — a $130 discount off their regular price of $429+. This is the first discount of the season for these best-selling headphones and one of the best Bose deals we’ve seen on Black Friday . AMAZON DEAL Bose QuietComfort Ultra Bluetooth Headphones Buy Now at Bose $199.00 $199.00 This deal gets you the QuietComfort Ultra Headphones in the 60th anniversary “Diamond Edition” colorway, on sale for 30% off. These powerful noise-cancelling headphones use multiple levels of active noise cancelling to block out outside noise and distractions. What that means: you get a more focused, deep and immersive music experience without hearing outside chatter or traffic. Bose is known for its superb audio quality, and these headphones deliver crisp highs, balanced mids and deep, resonating bass. Bose says its updated technology makes these headphones great for taking calls too with the built-in mics adapting to noisy environments so your voice always sounds crystal clear on calls. Battery…
